revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Lima |model=P2-HD |revision= |asin=B00WMKB7K8,B06XJ4D6ZQ;DE; |upc=856057005716 |price=129 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=December 2016 |type=mobile NAS |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3229 |cpu1_cspeed=1.5 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLM8G1WEPD-B031 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BYMA |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, unpopulated,, 3.3V TTL |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;2; |oui_eth=80:0E:24 }} {{TagLine|The Personal Cloud You Will Love}} :[https://meetlima.com/ Product page]
''LM1.5_V10'' and ''016-11-10'' are silkscreened on the board.
*[https://macsources.com/lima-personal-cloud-storage-review/ ''Lima'' Review on '''MacSources''']
Referred to as [[Lima Ultra]] in some press reports: *[https://www.zdnet.com/product/lima/ ''Lima Ultra: Tiny, personal cloud storage that just misses the mark'' on '''ZDNet'''] *[https://www.businessinsider.com/lima-ultra-personal-cloud-storage-review-2017-2 ''This little device is the cheapest, fastest cloud storage'' on '''Business Insider'''] *[https://github.com/catwell/postlima/blob/master/doc/root/howto-root-ultra.md ''How to get root access to Lima Ultra'' on '''GitHub'''] :Lima P1-WD, Lima P2-HD, Lima Ultra
